channel.description: CC 410 - Week 3 Wrapping Up 1/31 - Module 2: OOP 1/31 - OOP Example 1/31 - Restaurant 1 This Week 2/7 - Documentation, Testing, UML 2/7 - Doc & Testing Example 2/7 - Restaurant 2 Updates Discord Channel https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu Grading - Rubric on Canvas Code Comments on GitHub So far, so good?
